RESPONSE TEXT: I used to run with a raider gang a while back. Just didn't know any other way, ya know?
Well, one time a raid went wrong and I was left for dead on a highway somewhere.
Zeke and his boys found me while looking for spare parts. Took me in, fixed me up, and showed me I could make better use of my skills.
Now I stay, cuz I know these knuckleheads wouldn't leave me like that.
DIALOGUE AFTER: Player Default: Let's see what you've got.
